item.title: How to make npc talk and donator telly
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

Well first you would have to make the donator rank. let’s say its 5. so the code would be

if (cmd[0].equals("donatorzone") && (playerRights >= 5 || hasSpecialRights())) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "omg"); p.teleportToX = XXXX; // X Coords there p.teleportToY = YYYY; // Y Coords there }

Idk maybe that’s it… What deob you got? 307,508+??

item.title: How to make npc talk and donator telly
item.dc:creator: @SKILLING SKILLING
item.description:
@SKILLING wrote:

i was wondering if any could tell me how to make this a donator telly
if (cmd[0].equals(“donatorzone”))
{
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “omg”);
p.teleportToX = 1;
p.teleportToY = 2;
}

and also wat am i doing wrong to make this npc talk this is from npc option 1 folder
case 410:
p.setCoords(3093, 3489, 0);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Welcome to home Go to ::pvp or ::multi.”);
break;
410 for wise old man
